channel.title: Pictureflow Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.4.5
item.description:
- This is mainly a technical update. Different aspects of the application have been refined to seriously improve the speed the app operates in, such as:

  • Smarter memory management
  • New way of discovering file changes outside of Pictureflow
  • Pictureflow resizes thumbnails faster when the size of the window will change
  • Updating metadata in JPEGs will now work asynchronously
  • Process indicators (spinners) have been added in multiple locations, helping you to understand when certain processes are still being processed.
  • The update server has been migrated.

item.title: Version 1.4.4
item.description:
• The layout of the detail menu has been updated!
  • It is now possible to add keywords to your photos.
  • Easily clear metadata fields by clicking on the ‘x’ that appears when hovering.
  • Metadata can now also be edited in bulk. All editable metadata fields are shown when multiple photos are selected.
  • The process of creating a flow from a folder has been simplified and is therefore a lot quicker.
  • The update server has been migrated.
